title: Lewis and Clark National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Fort Clatsop Visitor Center and Fort Clatsop Replica  Winter Hours: September 7, 2015 through June 21, 2016 Open 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Closed Christmas Day Summer Hours: June 22, 2016 Through September 5, 2016 Open 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Netul Landing  Open daylight hours year round   Middle Village/Station Camp   Open daylight hours year round   Fort to Sea Trailhead and Surrounding Trails   Open daylight hours year round   Salt Works   Open daylight hours year round
